body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49913

#### PR description:

Technical no regressions expected:
- merge header with implementation (as expected for a plugin)
- use range-based loop when possible
- reduced cost of `fillMap` by using `deltaR2` vs `deltaR`
- simplified logic of event data retrieval

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 18634.0 -t 4 -j 8 -i all --ibeos` runs.
